{{Wireless embedded system |brand=AVM |model=FRITZ!Box 7580 |revision=(HW225) |series=AC2600 |ean=4023125027611 |asin=B01KKJFJ92;DE;,B077977K99;DE;, |est_release_date=08/17/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=now |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Lantiq (Intel) |cpu1_model=PXB4583;PXB4583EL2000, S6163N00, SLLK4; |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model=TC58BVG2S0HTA00 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC256M16DP-DI |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 3.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_module=AVM 555.87R-N |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_module=AVM 555.88R-AC |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=xDSL AFE;Lantiq;PSB 80318;PSB 80318 M, V1.2, XWAY VRX318;1; ,,, FPGA Chip;Xilinx;Spartan XC3S100E;;1; ,,, DECT Chip;Dialog;SC14446;;1; |flags=VDSL, ADSL2+, DECT, MU-MIMO, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=FRITZ!Box 7580 |default_ssid_regex=^FRITZ!Box 7580$ }}
:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''800''' Mbps - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''2600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AVM FRITZ!Box 7580 WLAN Modem Router}} :''(4x4 MU-MIMO, VDSL/ADSL2+, DECT, Media Server)'' :{{ProductPage|https://avm.de/produkte/fritzbox/fritzbox-7580/}} :4x4 MU-MIMO, 1x GbE WAN, 4x GbE LAN, 2x USB 3.0 :VDSL/ADSL2+ Modem (Annex B), DECT, Media Server *''Two WLAN Mini PCIe Card: 800Mbps (2.4GHz) + 1733Mbps (5GHz)'' :"555.87R Rev 01" and "555.88R Rev 01" is silkscreened on the board. {{see also|Acelink EW-7955MN|Acelink EW-7955MAC|AVM}} *{{boxmatrix|7580}} :CPU: VR10 @1GHz (Dual Core), Modem: [[Lantiq]] PSB 80318, RAM: 512MB :mips34_512MB_grx5_dect446_5geth_2ab_isdn_nt_2usb_host3_2wlan11n ===Specifications=== :CPU: [[Lantiq (Intel)]] GRX550, WLAN: 2x [[QCA]] QCA9984 :PXB4583EL2000 (SLLK4) 2x @1.0GHz ([[MIPS 34Kc]]) :Flash: ''Toshiba'' TC58BVG2S0HTA00 (512MB NAND) :RAM: ''Nanya'' NT5CC256M16DP-DI (512MB DDR3) :xDSL AFE: [[Lantiq]] PSB 80318 M V1.2 (XWAY VRX318) :FPGA: ''Xilinx'' Spartan XC3S100E; DECT: ''Dialog'' SC14446 ===Reviews=== *[https://maxwireless.de/2016/erster-eindruck-11-businessserver-avm-fritzbox-7580/ On '''MaxWireless'''] ===Forum threads=== *[https://www.ip-phone-forum.de/threads/das-innenleben-einer-7580-platinen-bilder.287251/ On '''iP-phone''' forums] *[https://www.onlinekosten.de/forum/showthread.php?t=147622&page=6 On '''OnlineKosten''' forums] *[http://extreme.pcgameshardware.de/internet-und-netzwerk/265117-howto-dsl-leitungstuning-oder-wie-hole-ich-einfach-mehr-heraus-157.html On '''PCGamesHardware''' forums] ===See also=== *https://avm.de/produkte/fritzbox/ *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7590]] - AC2600 WLAN Modem Router :(4x4 MU-MIMO, VDSL-35b/ADSL2+, DECT, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7582]] - AC1750 WLAN Modem Router :(BCM63138, G.fast VDSL/ADSL2+, DECT, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7580]] - AC2600 WLAN Modem Router :(4x4 MU-MIMO, VDSL/ADSL2+, DECT, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7560]] - AC1300 WLAN Modem Router :(VDSL/ADSL2, VoIP, DECT, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7490]] - AC1750 WLAN Modem Router :(VDSL/ADSL2+, DECT, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7430]] - N450 WLAN Modem Router :(VDSL/ADSL2+, VoIP/DECT, Mediaserver) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7390]] - N300 WLAN Modem Router :(VDSL/ADSL, DECT-Basis, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 5490]] - AC1750 WLAN Modem Router :(VDSL/ADSL2+, DECT, VoIP, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 4040]] - AC1300 WLAN Router :(GbE WAN, 4x LAN, USB 2.0/3.0, Mediaserver) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 4020]] - N450 WLAN Router :(FE WAN, 4x LAN, USB 2.0, Mediaserver) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 3490]] - AC1750 WLAN Modem Router :(VDSL/ADSL2+, 4x GbE LAN, Mediaserver) __NOTOC__
